events: Lost father at the age of 8
Lost their sibling Reynold when Reuro was 10 and Reynold was 4.
Lost mother at the age of 13
Lost their sibling Folpertus when Reuro was 17 and Folpertus was 20.
Lost their sibling Folcard when Reuro was 17 and Folcard was 19.
Lost their child Ghisele when Ghisele was 2 years old.
